(as of Nov 30,2022 05:03:13 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Lighting has been deeply rooted in the soul of human . In the unity of function and form，lamps not only become masters of creating atmosphere, but also add artistic tone to the space.

EXF has always been endeavoring in the combination of bright and art.

“EXTRA FUN AND BEAUTY for your home decoration” is our design concept and goal. We hope your life will be accompanied by us all the time.

C9 Christmas lights

Solar string lights

Meteor shower lights

Christmas String Lights

【Widely Used Solar Lights Outdoor】: This starbright solar LED string lights is a great choice for Christmas, Wedding, Patio, Garden, Yard, Party, Fence, Porch, Xmas Tree, Roof and so on.
【Energy-Saving & High Efficiency】: This outdoor string lights charging by solar energy, have no extra utility of electric cost, and no need to replace the battery. It can work up to 8~10 hours at night after fully charged under sunshine for 6~8 hours.
【8 Modes & Memory Function】: These solar mini lights have the ON/OFF button and mode button. You can select 8 different modes to satisfy your diverse needs by pressing the mode button. And the built-in memory chip saves your last modes setting, so there is no need to reset it.
*NOTES*: 1. Please power ON first before charging, and it will be charged and light on automatically. 2. Be sure the solar panel is in a sunny location – not in a shady area – and the solar panel faces the sun. 3. If any question about order or product, please contact seller and we will respond in 24 hours.

Read more

EXF warm white solar Christmas lights are perfect for your celebrations outdoors or around your front yard, bring warmth to your home!

An Ideal decor for our outdoor living

With 2022 upgraded solar panel, the outdoor string lights will provide you a better experience of outdoor living. It is an ideal decor for the Christmas trees and fence and more.

Energy Saving & IP65 Waterproof

The solar LED string lights are powered by solar energy, this light will lights up automatically at night and off during the day, no utility energy costs. With its IP65 water resistance performance, it can work as usual even in rainy days when there is still power with the battery, no need to worry about short circuit due to moisture.

8 Lighting Modes & Memory Function

Our solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof have memory function and it will remember the last light setting mode and no need to press the ON/OFF button every day. You can press the button on the solar panel to select any lighting mode you like.

Read more

8 Brilliant Lighting Modes:

  • Combination
  • Waves
  • Sequential
  • Slow glow
  • Chasing/flash
  • Slow fade
  • Twinkle/flash
  • Steady-on

Specifications:

  • LED Color: Warm White
  • LED quantity: 100 LED * 4 = 400 LEDs
  • Switch: ON/OFF, MODE (8 Modes)
  • Charging time: 6-8 hours & Working time: 8 -10 hours
  • String light Length: 33ft * 4 =132ft
  • Wire Length to first LED: 1.5m/4.9ft
  • Space Between LEDs: 10cm/0.32ft
  • Battery: 800MAH Ni-MH rechargeable battery

Read more

HOW to use it?

  • Assemble the lights according to the IM;
  • Remove the protective clear film on the solar panel;
  • Cover the solar panel entirely and press the ON/OFF button, ensure it is at ON mode, then press MODE button to select your favorite lighting mode;
  • Find a place you would like to decorate, make sure the solar panel can be exposed to efficient direct sunshine, meanwhile, this place will not have bright light source at night;
  • Softten the earth with water and insert the ground spike into the earth;
  • Adjust the solar panel and make it face upwardly, tighten the screw, it will turn on at night and turn off at dawn automatically.

WHY it doesn’t work?

  • Please place the solar panel under direct sunshine to charge for one or 2 days and it should be able to turn on as usual.
  • Check the solar panel is ON, cover the complete solar panel. If the lights come on, the button is in the on position.
  • If the sun is not enough weather, or the temperature of the cold season, please charge more than a few days.

Any questions please feel freely to ask us, we will help you solve problem quickly.

4.5
Price: $39.99 - $35.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:03:13 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:38:36 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Easy to install. Scan, Plug and Play. Full installation and setup in less than 10 minutes
Protected and informed, with Realtime phone app notifications, emails, SMS messages and automations (turn on optional sirens, smart plugs..)
FAIL/SAFE: Patented technology! Pair your leak sensors to battery powered valve controllers and/or sirens. No internet, no WiFi, power outage no worries!
Latest Wireless Technology LoRa: low-power consumption (5+ year battery life) and “Longest Range, by Far!” (1/4 mile, open air)
Whole house smart home solution: Your YoLink leak detection system is part of a complete product line, including smart wireless automatic water shut-off and a full smart home solution, including security, locks, plugs & switches, temperature, humidity, and smoke/CO sensors, and more
Requirements – Android or iOS smartphone, wired ethernet port or WiFi connection. App is always free, with 5 free texts per device, plus 5, per month.

INTRODUCTION:

  • YoLink Hub & Water Leak Sensors (see listing details for quantity)
  • The Hub connects your YoLink devices to the Internet and to the user-friendly YoLink app, and is the central controller for your YoLink wireless home automation system

FEATURES:

  • Wi-Fi (2.4 GHz only) or wired network connection options YoLink’s industry-leading long range communication (up to ¼ mile open air) based on LoRa long range technology

BENEFITS:

  • Very easy plug & play initial set-up – no special network or computer knowledge required. Simply plug the included Ethernet patch cord into an available working network port on your router (suggested) or use a 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi connection and be up and running in moments
  • While many smart home devices rely on the home Wi-Fi system and may crowd your network or harm your Wi-Fi performance, the YoLink devices communicate with the Hub via the proprietary YoLink Protocol at the 923.3 MHz frequency (only your Hub connects to the Wi-Fi/network and Internet)
  • Homes with devices on Wi-Fi, or other protocols, with access to the Internet, are each, individual, potential safety, privacy, and security risks. Acting as the internet gateway the YoLink Hub connects your YoLink devices to the internet via one encrypted connection, providing safety and security for your network and home

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Router with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Or router with an available Ethernet port (patch cord is included) Smartphone or tablet running iOS 9 or higher, Android 4.4 or higher Tools Required: None (Hub may optionally be wall-mounted. Refer to the Installation & User Guide for more information) Installation Difficulty Level: Moderately Easy

TECHNICAL SPECS:

  • Semtech LoRa RF Module YL09 microcontroller with 32-Bit RISC processor Frequency, LoRa: 923.3 MHz Frequency, Wi-Fi: 2412 – 2462 MHz Color: White Dimensions [L x W x D]: 4.33 x 4.33 x 1.06 inches (110 x 110 x 27 mm) Status LEDs (Top):
  • Green power indicator Red feature indicator Blue Internet indicator
  • Ethernet Status Indicators (Rear)
  • Green network speed indicator Yellow network speed indicator
  • Set button (Rear) Network connector: RJ45 Power connector: Micro-USB B Power: 5 Volts DC
  • Environmental: Operating Temperature Range: -4°F – 104°F (-20°C – 50°C) Operating Humidity Range: ≤ 90% non-condensing Intended for indoor use only

PACKAGE CONTENTS:

  • (1) YoLink Hub (1) USB cable (1) Ethernet patch cable (1) AC/DC plug-in power supply (1) Quick start guide
  • YoLink Water Leak Sensors (see listing details for quantity)

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:38:36 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Voice Control

Set up your Smart Plug Mini and app with Amazon’s Alexa or Google Home for the added convenience of voice control.

Alexa, turn on bedroom lamp Hey Google, turn off kitchen light

Control Your Devices from Anywhere

KMC Smart Plug Mini (15A 125V 60Hz 1875W)

Smart Plug Mini can controlled whenever and wherever! The KMC Mini Wi-Fi Smart Plug provide wireless control of your lights and appliances. No hub is required: compact mini smart plug connect devices control your device using phone. Using KMC Smart app, you can turn your devices on and off. Additional features like Away Mode and device sharing give your whole family fuller and brighter benefits.

Notes: After a power outage, outlets will retain their most recent setting to save energy.

Remote Control Schedules & Automation Device Sharing KMC Smart App Voice Control with Alexa & Google Home

Control from Anywhere

A table lamp accidentally left on at home doesn’t have to be a problem or source of anxiety. Simply use the free KMC Smart App to control your devices from the couch, the coffee shop, or the Caribbean.

Keep Your Kids on Schedule

With the scheduling benefits of your Smart Plug Mini, you have better control over your child’s daily activities. Make sure the television is turned off when they should be doing homework, and help make sure your kids are well-rested and ready for the next day.

Pretend You are at Home

Have the Smart Plug work for you when you’re out of town. Connecting a lamp to your smart plug can provide home security benefits. Setup your smart plugs with a schedule or automation, and your Smart Plug Mini will automatically turn your lights on or off to give the appearance that someone is home.

COMPATIBILITY: Works with Alexa & Google Assistant. No Hub Required. Requires a secured 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi network and a device running Android or iOS.
VOICE CONTROL: Control your Smart Plug Mini by saying “Alexa” or “Hey Google”. Seamlessly integrates with your existing smart speakers and routines.
SCHEDULING & AUTOMATION: The KMC Smart app allows you to automate your connected devices based on conditions like time, sunrise/sunset, weather, device status and more.
EASY SETUP & SHARING: Simply download the KMC Smart app and follow the in-app instructions to get started. With a few taps you can also share control of your device with family or friends.
WARRANTY & SUPPORT: UL/ETL Certified. Lifetime Warranty. US-based Customer Support.
ELECTRICAL RATING: 15A 125V 60Hz 1875W

Voice Control

Set up your Smart Plug Mini and app with Amazon’s Alexa or Google Home for the added convenience of voice control.

  • Alexa, turn on bedroom lamp
  • Hey Google, turn off kitchen light

Control Your Devices from Anywhere

KMC Smart Plug Mini (15A 125V 60Hz 1875W)

Smart Plug Mini can controlled whenever and wherever! The KMC Mini Wi-Fi Smart Plug provide wireless control of your lights and appliances. No hub is required: compact mini smart plug connect devices control your device using phone. Using KMC Smart app, you can turn your devices on and off. Additional features like Away Mode and device sharing give your whole family fuller and brighter benefits.

Notes: After a power outage, outlets will retain their most recent setting to save energy.

  • Remote Control
  • Schedules & Automation
  • Device Sharing
  • KMC Smart App
  • Voice Control with Alexa & Google Home

From the brand

LORRYTE, founded in 2019, is a factory that professional produces kinds of decorative lights, mainly Christmas lights. Our lights have many ways to transform your home into the wonderland of your dreams, and the classic lights will never go out of style.

We always focus on our products and our customers. We will continue to improve our brand, and continue to provide high quality, functional lights to the world.

Christmas Lights

【Auto On/Off】: It automatically charge at daytime and light up at night. set-in memory chip, save the last use mode automatically, no need to reset.
【Solar Powered & Energy-Saving】: These string lights are solar powered, “0”electricity cost. Just place the battery panel in sunny area, and the light will automatically turn on at night.(If use Fairy light in daytime, Please cover the solar panel completely .)
【8 Lighting Modes】: Press the button, 8 lighting modes for casually choose to satisfy your diverse needs, include Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-glo, Chasing/Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/Flash, Steady On.
【Widely Used Solar Christmas Lights】:These solar lights outdoor is a great decor choice for Patio, Garden, Yard, Porch, Tree, Wedding, Party, Restaurant, Hotel, Buildings, etc.

· Please Power “ON” first before charging. it will be charged automatically. Cover the solar panel to check if it is ON.

· It is only designed to be protected from the rain. Please Do Not immerse it in the water.

· Please tear off the protective film from the solar panel before using.

From the brand

About DEWENWILS

DEWENWILS has maintained scientific rigor to create pragmatic and design-aesthetic products of great value. Specializing in Tools and Home Improvement, Consumer Electronics and Outdoor Equipment,our products range from Timer Series, Outlet Switches and Light Sockets to Extension Wire and Lamps. Since 2016, our products boom globally, bringing intelligent convenience and new energy infusion to your life

Outdoor Timer

Remote Control Outlet

Low Voltage Transformer

Extension cord reel

BRAND VISION

Back to the essence of your home life-simplicity, safety and comfort

WHAT MAKES DEWENWILS UNIQUE

Attach great caution with the whole productionￚeach product has undergone the product development of a full range of ideas, technical parameters adjustment, strict quality control, and revision based on customer feedback.

【WEATHER-RESISTANT CONNECTION】 This waterproof extension cord connector provides a watertight sealed space to protect outdoor & indoor plug connections from the elements like water, snow, rain, dust, and dirt to ensure circuit safety ( Note: It is just water-resistant. Do not submerse it in water)
【AMPLE & AJUSTABLE COMPARTMENT】Large housing holds both multiple connections and one on one connection; compatible with AWG 12/14/16 extension cord and flat cable; slide to adjust the position of the limiter for different lengths of connections
【FIRM AND TIGHT CONNECTION】Rubber seals at both ends conform well to the power cord; 2 clamps hold the cords tightly in place; adjustable anti-slip serrations keep the cords securely connected to prevent the plugs from sliding or disconnecting even if tug the cords in uses
【DOUBLE LOCK & PROTECTION】 The top lid and 4 extra durable latches enhance the sealing of the outdoor extension cord safety seal; 4 lockable latches secure the cord safety seal box fastened for safe use even if the top lid is broken off
【EASY TO USE】 No tools or installation required; place the extension cord properly; slide the limiter to keep cords securely connected; lock the top lid and 4 latches for seal; hanging to save space; ideal for holiday lights, string lights, pool pumps and garden tools etc

DEWENWILS is a professional manufacturer specializing in Home Improvement, Consumer Electronics and Outdoor Equipment. Our primary aim is to provide you and other valuable members with higher quality products. A satisfying shopping experience is amongst our top priorities.

4-Pack DEWENWILS Extension Cord Safety Cover

Protect You and Your Electrical Devices

Seals out water, snow, rain, dust, and dirt, keeps cords dry and together. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor applications like holiday decoration, string lights, water fountains, pool pumps, garden tools, and power tools, etc.

Note: It is just water-resistant. Do not submerge it in water.

Specifications:

Capacity: 12/14/16 Gauge Cords & Flat Cable

Dimension: 8.07 x 2.83 x2.83 Inch

Available colors: Green & Black

  • Package Includes:
  • Extension cord seal cover x 4
  • Limiter x 4
  • Hanger x 4
  • User Manual x 1

Read more

Fits 12/14/16 Gauge Cords & Flat Cable

Ample compartment holds UP TO 12 GAUGE CORDS and FLAT CABLE.

Adjust to fit multiple connections and one on one connections.

Four Lockable Latches

Lock the weatherproof cover in a tighter way with the top lid and 4 extra lockable latches. Creates a higher degree of sealing by double lock way. When the top lid is broken off, the cord safety seal cover can be locked tightly by these latches for safety uses.

Adjustable Limiter

Slide to adjust the limiter for different lengths of connection. 2 Clamps at both ends fix the cord tightly in place.

The anti-slip serrations keep the cords securely connected to prevent plugs from sliding or disconnecting in pulling.
